bibl.title: The Kingdom of Kush. Handbook of the Napatan-Meroitic Civilization. (Handbuch der Orientalistik. 31.)
bibl.note: tabl., 1 arbre généal., 6 cartes, 28 figg. h.t. et 10 pll.
The history and culture of the peoples of the Middle Nile Region (11th cent. B.C. - A.D. 5th cent.). - See pp. 424-432: Kush and Ptolemaic Egypt; - 448-455: The conflict with Rome (29-21/20 B.C.).
TÖRÖK László, The Kingdom of Kush. Handbook of the Napatan-Meroitic Civilization. (Handbuch der Orientalistik. 31.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1997, 8°, xvii-590 pp., tabl., 1 arbre généal., 6 cartes, 28 figg. h.t. et 10 pll. ISBN 90-04-10448-8.
